entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sydney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: J.A. Douglas McCurdy Sydney Airport 10:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: NNW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5 except zero along parts of the coast.

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
